name: Indian city with pincode
description: Expression to extract city and pincode from address in India
content:
Expression to extract city and pincode from address for India.
will match             will not match
======================================
Chennai 600015         Chennai - 000000
Chennai - 600015       Chennai - 000 000
Chennai-600015
Chennai-600 015
Chennai - 600 015
Chennai- 600015
Chennai -600015
author: orthodoc
